alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clarendon; Lee; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 7:21PM EDT until August 07 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lee County in central South Carolina... East central Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Clarendon County in central South Carolina... Sumter County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 721 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Oakland to near Eastover to near Congaree National Park, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Sumter, Manning, South Sumter, Shaw Air Base, Alcolu, Oakland, Woods Bay State Park, Santee Cooper Regional Airport, Mulberry, Sumter County Airport, Millwood, Poinsett State Park, Turbeville, Mayesville, Pinewood, Lynchburg, Paxville, Cane Savannah, Dalzell, and Rimini. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 111 and 146. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
